title: How can I fix a Pixel 3A phone screen that is now black and no response holding power/volume buttons
content: My wife's Pixel 3A phone now has a black screen, with an occasional image appearing in the bottom left part of the screen (see image attached). I've tried multiple times to hold down the power and power/volume buttons. But the phone remains unresponsive. Please advise.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3a XL
